gravestones.cannot_open_wrong_player: This gravestone can only be interacted with by its owner, %s!
Gravestone has a spawnDate of %1$s and a graveOwner of %2$s (%3$s)
Gravestone has the following contents data: %s
Gravestone has a spawnDate of %s and no graveOwner!
commands.gravestones.getdata.player.cann: Could not find gravestones data file!
Could not read gravestones data file!
commands.gravestones.getdata.player.grav: %1$s has graves at the following locations: %2$s, %3$s, %4$s
configs.gravestones.decay_with_deaths.to: Whether gravestones are damaged from further deaths
configs.gravestones.decay_with_time.tool: Whether gravestones are damaged over time
configs.gravestones.decay_time.tooltip: The amount of time it takes for gravestones to be damaged by time (if enabled)
configs.gravestones.decay_time_type.tool: Whether decay time is based on real-world time (Real Time), or time the server is active (Ticks). Gravestone decay will occur regardless of whether chunks are loaded
configs.gravestones.aesthetic_decay.tool: Whether graves decay affects gameplay, or is purely visual
configs.gravestones.store_experience.too: Whether graves store experience. If not, experience is dropped on the ground on death
configs.gravestones.experience_cap.toolt: Whether graves have a limit to how much experience they can store. This limit is the same as with vanilla deaths (100 points)
configs.gravestones.experience_kept.tool: How experience kept on death is calculated. Either no experience is lost, a fraction is kept, or it uses the vanilla calculation (7 * current level)
configs.gravestones.experience_decay.too: Whether grave decay affects the experience stored in the grave (if enabled). If so, experience dropped is divided by the decay stage (stage 1 drops 100%, stage 2 drops 50%, and stage 3 drops 33%)
configs.gravestones.drop_experience.tool: Whether gravestones drop experience on the ground when collected, or give it directly to the player
configs.gravestones.gravestone_accessibl: Whether players who aren't the owner are prevented from accessing a grave's items
configs.gravestones.broadcast_collect_in: Whether grave collection is broadcasted in chat
configs.gravestones.broadcast_coordinate: Whether the coordinates of placed graves are broadcasted in chat
configs.gravestones.aesthetic_gravestone: Whether aesthetic gravestones can be crafted for building purposes
configs.gravestones.spawn_gravestone_ske: Whether gravestones spawn skeletons when their owner is near
configs.gravestones.console_info.tooltip: Whether highly detailed information about graves is recorded in console. This is mostly just for debugging!
configs.gravestones.show_heads.tooltip: Whether dead player's heads appear at the foot of their gravestones.
configs.gravestones.time_format.tooltip: The format of the death time shown on gravestones
modmenu.summaryTranslation.gravestones: Adds Gravestones that store items after death.
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.graveston: Adds Gravestones that store items after death.
